title: The Slug Menace/Quick guide

properties.name: description
properties.value: Item required: Commorb. Recommended item: Ardougne teleport

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:The Slug Menace/Quick guide
 This quick guide has an in-depth guide here.
It contains a more detailed description of dialogue, cutscenes, and storyline.

Details[edit | edit source]

Start point Talk to Sir Tiffy Cashien in Falador.
Official difficultyIntermediate
DescriptionThe small village of Witchaven was all but deserted when the Fishing Platform was built a short ways off the coast. Now, some of the inhabitants of the village have been acting somewhat strangely....
Official lengthMedium
Requirements
  • Completion of the following quests:
    • Wanted!
      • Recruitment Drive
        • Black Knights' Fortress
        • Druidic Ritual
      • The Lost Tribe
        • Rune Mysteries
        • Goblin Diplomacy
      • Enter the Abyss
      • Priest in Peril
    • Sea Slug
  • 30 Crafting (not boostable)
  • 30 Runecraft (not boostable)
  • 30 Slayer (not boostable)
  • 30 Thieving (not boostable)
  • The ability to defeat a level 62 enemy with Melee.
  • You must have the Commorb in your inventory to start the quest.
Items required
  • Commorb (can get another by speaking to Sir Tiffy)
  • Swamp paste (not consumed)
  • Dead sea slug (obtainable during the quest)
  • At least 5 rune/pure essence (bring 15-20 in case they shatter; succeeding with 5 is very unlikely)
  • Chisel
  • 5 open inventory slots
  • Access to the Air, Water, Earth, Fire and Mind Altars
    • Elemental talisman OR Air, Water, Earth and Fire talismans or tiaras
    • Mind talisman or tiara
    OR
    • Travelling through the Abyss or using a Runecraft cape
Recommended
  • 35 Combat level
  • Charged Abyssal bracelet if going through the Abyss
  • Stamina or energy potions
  • Fast travel to several locations
    • Falador (Falador teleport)
    • Witchaven (Ardougne teleport or Fairy rings to blr)
    • Outpost (Necklace of Passage)
    • Air Altar (Falador teleport, Skills necklace to the Crafting Guild or travelling through the Abyss)
    • Water Altar (Lumbridge teleport, Necklace of Passage to the Wizards' Tower or the Abyss)
    • Earth Altar (Varrock teleport, Lumberyard teleport, Digsite pendant, Balloon transport system or the Abyss)
    • Fire Altar (Ring of Dueling or Amulet of Glory to Al Kharid, Gnome glider or the Abyss)
    • Mind Altar (Mind Altar teleport tablet, Falador teleport or the Abyss)
    • Abyss, if using that method (Amulet of Glory to Edgeville, Ring of Wealth to the Grand Exchange or Fairy rings to dkr)
  • Armour and some food
  • Melee weapon to defeat the Slug Prince, which cannot be damaged in other ways
  • Prayer potions to counter the Slug Prince's prayer drain
Enemies to defeat Slug Prince (level 62)
{"requirements":"*Completion of the following quests:\n**[[Wanted!]]\n***[[Recruitment Drive]]\n****[[Black Knights' Fortress]]\n****[[Druidic Ritual]]\n***[[The Lost Tribe]]\n****[[Rune Mysteries]]\n****[[Goblin Diplomacy]]\n***[[Enter the Abyss]]\n***[[Priest in Peril]]\n**[[Sea Slug]]\n*<span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Crafting\" data-level=\"30\">[[File:Crafting icon.png|21x21px|link=Crafting|alt=Crafting]] 30 [[Crafting]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is not boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">not boostable</span>)</sup>\n*<span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Runecraft\" data-level=\"30\">[[File:Runecraft icon.png|21x21px|link=Runecraft|alt=Runecraft]] 30 [[Runecraft]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is not boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">not boostable</span>)</sup>\n*<span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Slayer\" data-level=\"30\">[[File:Slayer icon.png|21x21px|link=Slayer|alt=Slayer]] 30 [[Slayer]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is not boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">not boostable</span>)</sup>\n*<span class=\"scp\" data-skill=\"Thieving\" data-level=\"30\">[[File:Thieving icon.png|21x21px|link=Thieving|alt=Thieving]] 30 [[Thieving]]</span> <sup>(<span title=\"This requirement is not boostable\" style=\"cursor:help; text-decoration: underline dotted;\">not boostable</span>)</sup>\n*The ability to defeat a level 62 enemy with [[Melee]].\n*You must have the [[Commorb]] in your inventory to start the quest.","desc":"The small village of [[Witchaven]] was all but deserted when the [[Fishing Platform]] was built a short ways off the coast. Now, some of the inhabitants of the village have been acting somewhat strangely....","difficulty":"Intermediate","kills":"[[Slug Prince]] ''(level 62)''","name":"The Slug Menace/Quick guide","start":"Talk to [[Sir Tiffy Cashien]] in [[Falador]].","length":"Medium","items":"*[[Commorb]] (can get another by speaking to [[Sir Tiffy]])\n*[[Swamp paste]] (not consumed)\n*[[Dead sea slug]] (obtainable during the quest)\n*At least 5 [[rune essence|rune]]/[[pure essence]] (bring 15-20 in case they shatter; succeeding with 5 is very unlikely)\n*[[Chisel]]\n*5 open inventory slots\n*Access to the [[Air Altar|Air]], [[Water Altar|Water]], [[Earth Altar|Earth]], [[Fire Altar|Fire]] and [[Mind Altar]]s\n**[[Elemental talisman]] '''OR''' [[air talisman|Air]], [[water talisman|Water]], [[earth talisman|Earth]] and [[fire talisman|Fire]] [[talisman]]s or [[tiara (disambiguation)|tiara]]s\n**[[Mind talisman]] or [[mind tiara|tiara]]\n*:'''OR'''\n**Travelling through the [[Abyss]] or using a [[Runecraft cape]]"}

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

Starting out[edit | edit source]

Item required: Commorb. Recommended item: Ardougne teleport

  • Talk to Sir Tiffy Cashien in Falador Park to get a Commorb v2. ( 1)…
    1Do you have any jobs for me yet?
    • Note: Savant will contact you through the Commorb v2 multiple times throughout the quest to scan your surroundings and/or provide hints.
  • Talk to Col. O'Niall on the north-east dock in Witchaven. ( 1•3)…
    1What's the mission?
    3Who are the important people in Witchaven?
  • Talk to the following people in Witchaven in any order:
    • Talk to Brother Maledict (church)
    • Talk to Mayor Hobb (most north-west building) ( 1)…
      1I'm here to relax.
      . After Savant prompts you, scan with your Commorb v2.
    • Talk to Holgart (green shirt, north-east of quest icon, by the boat to the Fishing Platform)
  • Talk to Col. O'Niall again.

The shrine[edit | edit source]

Jorral's location.

Item required: Commorb. Recommended item: Necklace of passage

  • Climb down the Old Ruin Entrance (Dungeon sign) west of Witchaven.
  • Push the false wall on the east wall by the entrance (red on minimap).
  • Follow the path to the imposing door, using the shortcut if able, try to open it.
  • Scan with the Commorb v2 to acquire the door transcription (make sure you have one free inventory space).
  • Pick up a dead sea slug just west of the imposing door. (If you do not pick up the dead sea slug, you will not be able to talk to Jorral).
  • Talk to Jorral in the outpost (necklace of passage) north-west of Ardougne. ( 2)…
    2Translations
    if Making History has not been started.

The pages[edit | edit source]

The solution of the puzzle.

Items required: 1 swamp paste, the Commorb, a dead seaslug, and 5 free inventory spaces

  • Talk to Col. O'Niall.
  • Talk to Brother Maledict.
  • Go to the mayor's house and search the study desk until you get a page.
  • Talk to Ezekial Lovecraft in the fishing store (make sure you have one free inventory space).
  • Talk to Col. O'Niall (make sure you have 3 free inventory spaces)
  • Use swamp paste on one of the fragments. Savant will stop you.
  • Talk to Jeb (near Holgart) and travel to the Fishing Platform.
  • Talk to Bailey on the south-west part Fishing Platform, give him the dead slug.
  • Use the sea slug glue on a fragment, then solve the puzzle.

The imposing door[edit | edit source]

Items required: chisel, 5+ rune or pure essence, the Commorb, melee combat equipment, talismans to enter the respective altars (not needed if using abyss)

  • Right click the pages and select shape-options on the pages to shape essences into air, water, fire, earth, and mind.
    • Note: It is possible and likely to fail and break the essence.
  • Use the chiselled stones on their respective Runic altar. It is recommended to bring extra rune essence in case they are destroyed.
    • Air: the Air Altar is south of Falador
    • Mind: the Mind Altar is north of Falador (just below the Wilderness)
    • Water: the Water Altar is south of Lumbridge (next to the shack to Zanaris)
    • Earth: the Earth Altar is north-east of Varrock (you can use balloon transport system if unlocked)
    • Fire: the Fire Altar is west of the Duel Arena in Al Kharid (you can use ring of dueling)
      • Note: It is possible and likely to fail this step as well.
  • Use the handmade runes on the imposing door in the cave underneath Witchaven. Make sure to bring the Commorb with you.
  • Kill the level 62 Slug Prince, only melee can damage it and it drains your Prayer points.
    • Note: It is possible to safespot with a halberd
  • Talk to Sir Tiffy Cashien. ( 1)…
    1Slug Menance.

Quest complete!

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • 1 Quest point
  • 3,500 Crafting experience
  • 3,500 Runecraft experience
  • 3,500 Thieving experience
  • Promotion to Proselyte among the Temple Knights. This means you can buy and wear Proselyte armour with a greater Prayer bonus than Initiate. You can buy each piece individually, or buy the armour pack which, when opened, gives you the plate, helm, and legs/tassets all at once. The pack costs 25,000 coins.
    • Buying the upgraded armour in separate pieces cost more: the helm costs 8,000 coins, the platelegs and plateskirt cost 10,000 coins, and the platebody costs 12,000 coins for a total of 30,000 coins.
    • Required for the Falador Hard Diary

rawContent:
{{external|rs}}
{{Quick Guide}}

==Details==
{{Quest details page|The Slug Menace}}

==Walkthrough==
===Starting out===
''Item required: Commorb. Recommended item: Ardougne teleport''
{{Checklist|
*Talk to [[Sir Tiffy Cashien]] in Falador Park to get a [[Commorb v2]]. {{Chat option|1Do you have any jobs for me yet?}}
**Note: [[Savant]] will contact you through the Commorb v2 multiple times throughout the quest to scan your surroundings and/or provide hints.
*Talk to [[Col. O'Niall]] on the north-east dock in [[Witchaven]]. {{Chat option|1What's the mission?|3Who are the important people in Witchaven?}}
*Talk to the following people in Witchaven in any order:
**Talk to [[Brother Maledict]] (church)
**Talk to [[Mayor Hobb]] (most north-west building) {{Chat option|1I'm here to relax.}}. After Savant prompts you, scan with your Commorb v2.
**Talk to [[Holgart]] (green shirt, north-east of quest icon, by the boat to the Fishing Platform)
*Talk to Col. O'Niall again.
}}

===The shrine===
[[File:Outpost location.png|right|thumb|250px|[[Jorral]]'s location.]]
''Item required: Commorb.''
''Recommended item: Necklace of passage''
{{Checklist|
*Climb down the Old Ruin Entrance (Dungeon sign) west of [[Witchaven]].
*Push the false wall on the east wall by the entrance (red on minimap).
*Follow the path to the imposing door, using the shortcut if able, try to open it.
*Scan with the [[Commorb v2]] to acquire the door transcription (make sure you have one free inventory space).
*Pick up a [[dead sea slug]] just west of the imposing door. (If you do not pick up the dead sea slug, you will not be able to talk to Jorral).
*Talk to [[Jorral]] in the outpost (necklace of passage) north-west of Ardougne. {{Chat option|2Translations}} if [[Making History]] has not been started.
}}
===The pages===
[[File:The Slug Menace page puzzle.png|thumb|325px|The solution of the puzzle.]]
''Items required: 1 swamp paste, the Commorb, a dead seaslug, and 5 free inventory spaces''
{{Checklist|
*Talk to [[Col. O'Niall]].
*Talk to [[Brother Maledict]].
*Go to the mayor's house and search the study desk until you get a page.
*Talk to [[Ezekial Lovecraft]] in the fishing store (make sure you have one free inventory space).
*Talk to Col. O'Niall (make sure you have 3 free inventory spaces)
*Use swamp paste on one of the fragments. Savant will stop you.
*Talk to [[Jeb]] (near Holgart) and travel to the Fishing Platform.
*Talk to [[Bailey]] on the south-west part Fishing Platform, give him the dead slug.
*Use the sea slug glue on a fragment, then solve the puzzle.
}}

===The imposing door===
''Items required: chisel, 5+ rune or pure essence, the Commorb, melee combat equipment, talismans to enter the respective altars (not needed if using abyss)''
{{Checklist|
*Right click the pages and select shape-options on the pages to shape essences into air, water, fire, earth, and mind.
**'''Note:''' It is possible and likely to fail and break the essence.
*Use the chiselled stones on their respective [[Runic altar]]. It is recommended to bring extra rune essence in case they are destroyed.
**Air: the [[Air Altar]] is south of [[Falador]]
**Mind: the [[Mind Altar]] is north of Falador (just below the [[Wilderness]])
**Water: the [[Water Altar]] is south of [[Lumbridge]] (next to the shack to [[Zanaris]])
**Earth: the [[Earth Altar]] is north-east of [[Varrock]] (you can use [[balloon transport system]] if unlocked)
**Fire: the [[Fire Altar]] is west of the [[Duel Arena]] in [[Al Kharid]] (you can use [[ring of dueling]])
***'''Note:''' It is possible and likely to fail this step as well.
*Use the handmade runes on the imposing door in the cave underneath Witchaven. Make sure to bring the Commorb with you.
*Kill the level 62 [[Slug Prince]], only melee can damage it and it drains your Prayer points.
**'''Note:''' It is possible to safespot with a halberd
*Talk to Sir Tiffy Cashien. {{Chat option|1Slug Menance.}}
}}
'''Quest complete!'''

==Rewards==
{{Quest rewards page|The Slug Menace}}

{{The Slug Menace}}
